 2018-07762018-06-14PCH,  ,  ,  , 
ActNational Capital Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of DEBORAH LYNN MORRISON of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a member of the Board of Directors of the National Capital Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective June 25, 2018, in the place of Bob Plamondon, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
